md:
giải nghĩa từ "attracts" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Attracts** (verb)

* Meaning: to draw someone's attention or interest; to make someone want to do something or go somewhere
* Vietnamese: hấp dẫn, thu hút, lôi cuốn

Example sentence: The beautiful scenery attracts many tourists to visit the island.

* Related words: attract, attraction, attractive

Note: The verb "attracts" is in the present tense, indicating that the action of drawing attention or interest is happening now.

Attracts (verb)

  • Meaning: to draw someone's attention or interest; to make someone want to do something or go somewhere
  • Vietnamese: hấp dẫn, thu hút, lôi cuốn

Example sentence: The beautiful scenery attracts many tourists to visit the island.
